rule.descr: Allow ICMP for path MTU discovery
TEMPORARY: Allow SSH from local network
TEMPORARY: Allow HTTP from local network
TEMPORARY HTTPS access from local network
TEMPORARY HTTP access from local network
Allow SSH from LAN to Firewall
Allow Trusted to access all Services
Allow Trusted to IoT Cloud devices
Allow Trusted to IoT Local devices
Block Trusted from accessing Guest network
Allow DNS from all VLANs to AdGuard
Allow DNS TCP from all VLANs to AdGuard
Block IoT Cloud to internal networks
Block IoT Local from everything else
